SENIOR TECHNICAL DESIGNER

SUMMARY

Product Developer/Technical Designer with strengths in apparel, handbags and jewelry.
I have an extensive knowledge of materials, manufacturing and quality assurance.
Dynamic product engineer highly skilled in creative problem solving with exceptional collaborative and interpersonal skills, who illustrates sophisticated expertise in a variety of innovative approaches, to design, prototype and test creative products, services and experiences.
I thrive working within a team environment and I have extensive experience working in partnership with domestic and international teams.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Industrial Design Engineer

Location: Allentown, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Manufacturing

Description:
Are you a creative and innovative individual with a strong passion for consumer electronics and design? We are seeking an Industrial Design Engineer to join our dynamic team in the consumer electronics industry. In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the development of cutting-edge products that will enhance the lives of our customers. If you have a knack for problem-solving, an eye for aesthetics, and a desire to improve user experiences, we want to hear from you!
As an Industrial Design Engineer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and deliver innovative product designs. You will be responsible for conducting research, generating concepts, creating prototypes, and refining designs based on user feedback. Not only will you be involved in the early stages of the design process, but you will also play a vital role in ensuring the manufacturability and quality of the final products. This role requires a deep understanding of design principles, material science, engineering, and manufacturing processes.
Responsibilities· Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Engineering, Marketing, Sales, Business, to define product requirements and specifications· Conduct user research to understand user needs and preferences· Generate creative and feasible concepts that meet user and business goals· Create detailed High Fidelity Models, renderings, and prototypes· Collaborate with mechanical engineers to ensure product functionality and manufacturability· Conduct design reviews and seek feedback from stakeholders· Conduct usability tests and iterate designs based on user feedback· Ensure designs comply with industry standards and regulations· Create and maintain design documentation, including drawings, specifications, and design files· Collaborate with suppliers to source and select appropriate materials and finishes
Requirements· Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering· Proven experience in design: Consumer Electronics, Military, IOT, Smart Products· Strong knowledge of design principles, material science, and manufacturing processes· Familiarity with rapid prototyping techniques· Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills· Strong communication and collaboration skills· Detail-oriented and a keen eye for aesthetics· Ability to adapt to changing project requirements· Knowledge of industry trends and emerging technologies· Understanding of usability and human factors engineering· Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and projects
Generous benefits, relocation assistance.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
